mapper.select: SELECT id, book_name, book_author, daily_date, intro, genre, total_point, rent_point, book_end, total_favorite, total_star, (SELECT concat(file_dir, '/', file_name) FROM imagefile WHERE book_id=book.id AND content_type LIKE ('image/%') AND image_type='main' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 0, 1) AS imagePath FROM book WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book(book_name, book_author,total_hit,intro,genre, reg_date,edit_date,total_point,rent_point,book_end,total_favorite,daily_date,total_star) VALUES(#{book_name}, #{book_author},0, #{intro}, #{genre}, now(),now(),0,0,"N",0,#{daily_date},0)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(book_name) FROM book where replace(book_name,' ','')= #{book_name}

SELECT id, book_name, book_author, daily_date, genre, (SELECT concat(file_dir, '/', file_name) FROM imagefile WHERE book_id=book.id AND content_type LIKE ('image/%') AND image_type='main' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 0, 1) as imagePath FROM book WHERE replace(book_name,' ','') like concat('%', #{book_name}, '%') OR replace(book_author,' ','') like concat('%', #{book_name}, '%')

SELECT id, book_name, book_author, daily_date, genre, (SELECT concat(file_dir, '/', file_name) FROM imagefile WHERE book_id=book.id AND content_type LIKE ('image/%') AND image_type='carousel' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 0, 1) as imagePath FROM book order by rand() limit 3;

SELECT id, book_name, book_author, daily_date, genre, total_hit, intro, (SELECT concat(file_dir, '/', file_name) FROM imagefile WHERE book_id=book.id AND content_type LIKE ('image/%') AND image_type='main' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 0, 1) as imagePath FROM book WHERE genre=#{genre} ORDER BY total_hit DESC limit 0,4;
mapper.update: UPDATE book SET total_favorite=total_favorite+1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE book SET total_favorite=total_favorite-1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE book SET total_star=(select truncate(avg(star_point),2) FROM starmark WHERE book_id = #{id}) where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select b.id, b.book_name,(SELECT concat(file_dir, '/', file_name) FROM imagefile WHERE book_id=b.id AND content_type LIKE ('image/%') AND image_type='main' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 0, 1) AS imagePath from book b where b.id in ( select f.book_id from favorite f where f.gender = 'F' group by f.book_id order by count(f.book_id) desc) limit 0,5;

select b.id, b.book_name, b.book_author, (SELECT concat(file_dir, '/', file_name) FROM imagefile WHERE book_id=b.id AND content_type LIKE ('image/%') AND image_type='main' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 0, 1) AS imagePath from book b where b.id in ( select f.book_id from favorite f where f.gender = 'M' group by f.book_id order by count(f.book_id) desc) limit 0,5;

SELECT id, book_name, book_author, daily_date, intro, genre, total_point, intro, rent_point, book_end, total_favorite, total_star, (SELECT concat(file_dir, '/', file_name) FROM imagefile WHERE book_id=book.id AND content_type LIKE ('image/%') AND image_type='main' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 0, 1) AS imagePath FROM book WHERE daily_date = #{daily_date}
